pull.title: [depends] Boost 1.61.0
pull.body:
Boost 1.59.0 seems to be causing wake from sleep issues on Windows, see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/8806. 
@laanwj suggested bumping Boost to 1.61.0 for 0.14.0.

events.body:
utACK 16f8823

Aren't we trying to get rid of Boot entirely?

> Aren't we trying to get rid of Boot entirely?

I doubt we'll succeed in that by 0.14, and it's not that much of a priority. So following the upstream to get rid of known bugs makes sense for now.
As this fixes a known bug, don't we want this in 0.13.1?
Can this bring even more new bugs? ;-)
utACK 16f88230885bf962286c5a00fe092d3c56d4eab4, I've been meaning to do this as well.
